title: Some of Elise SFX not working?
body:
So, it's my first game of the day (hence why I said Elise, I'm not sure if it's doing this with other champions), but usually it makes noises when I AA or use any abilities, but it's just silent now except for Elise talking or spiderlings attacking. It doesn't even make the noise it usually does when I transform, and it's really bothering me

Again, I'm not sure if it's just for Elise or other champions as well, but after this game I'm gonna try repairing my client or something, because I do know this has happened before, I just don't remember how I fixed it. If anyone has any suggestions or ideas, please let me know

Thanks guys

replies.body:
Hey MIdder Scray,

We are aware of the issue with Elise. This is not a problem with your client, this is something that is bugged. Thank you for taking the time to post this and we are trying to fix the situations as soon as we can.

Ranger XIV
I just played her some more and it's fixed now. Thank you! :)
